com.sri.ai.expresso.core

Class SyntaxTreeBasedSubExpressionAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.expresso.core.SyntaxTreeBasedSubExpressionAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubExpressionAddress

    @Beta
public class SyntaxTreeBasedSubExpressionAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubExpressionAddress
    A SubExpressionAddress based on a path over the syntax tree of an expression taking to the addressed sub-expression.
    Author:
    braz
